remarks: Value of the product of two metrics.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tmsxps.p $e |- P = ( dist ` ( ( toMetSp ` M ) Xs. ( toMetSp ` N ) ) ) $.
tmsxps.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
tmsxps.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) $.
tmsxpsval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
tmsxpsval.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. Y ) $.
tmsxpsval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
tmsxpsval.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Y ) $.
tmsxpsval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( <. A , B >. P <. C , D >. ) = if ( ( A M C ) <_ ( B N D ) , ( B N D ) , ( A M C ) ) ) $.
